item.description:
Gratitude for small things enriches us beyond measure. It helps us focus on the positive in our lives and what we focus on multiplies and a regular practice of gratitude can help make us happier. From various short vignettes by M.J. Ryan which are correlated with basic Shin teachings. Presented by Juliane Dean.

See our main web site:

www.bffct.net
item.how_to_find_us: Mansfield Freeman Center is towards the end of the road next to cementary.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Attitudes of Gratitude: How To Give And Receive Joy Every Day Of Your Life
